name: Spiralizer
description:
Move quickly through the detritus of the world.

Move with 'WASD' keys

Look with Mouse

Jump/Double Jump with 'Space'

Post a comment with 'E'

Note: I am considering expanding this project, but would like to get some playtester feedback. Please use the comment button to post any and all feedback you have, or else email me at neighbourhoodsnake@gmail.com 

Also, the scoreboard and comment button won't work if you are offline, soz.
